headings.usage: All section titles, modal headers, and kanban column titles.

mono.usage: Dates, IDs, Tags, and tiny metadata.

usage_rules.gradients: Use subtle noise textures over solid colors instead of linear gradients.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise SVG overlay on the main background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'tracing beam' effect on active cards (animated border gradient).

images.description: Abstract dark geometric shapes for empty states or login background

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'LayoutDashboard', 'CheckSquare', 'Calendar', 'Settings', 'Plus', 'MoreVertical', 'Trash2'.

principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix industrial dashboard aesthetics with soft, organic motion.
Negative Space: Don't cram the Kanban columns. Leave breathing room.
Contrast: Text must be legible. Use APCA standards.
Anti-Pattern: No full-screen gradients. No 'Inter' for headings.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid. The sidebar should be collapsible on mobile. The Kanban board must support drag-and-drop (mocked or functional). Use the provided image URLs for avatars. Ensure the dark theme is the default and only theme.
